body_content.explanation: the state of not being a member of an organization or group:
examples: In the UK, it is illegal to discriminate against employees on the basis of their membership or non-membership of a trade union.
The writer was required to prove his non-membership of the Communist Party.
Non-membership in a religious or community group could raise mortality risk in older people, the study found.

body_content.explanation: (of an organization) not open only to members:
examples: The charity is a nonmembership organisation whose services are made available to anyone who needs them.
